channel.title: Player aging ingame
channel.description:
Hello, moparscape so I have races (Vampires, werewolfs, and witches) I wanted to see If I could implement an aging system so that players can tell how long they have lived as immortals. I have having an issue with humans though since humans are not immortal what consequence should I give them for dying after lets say 100 years of life?
Any suggestions would be great if I should add or remove anything here!.

item.title: Player aging ingame
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vain_:

for every dark spirit you defeat and release their souls to the desired god you follow, you are blessed with energy. the more energy the longer you remain “alive.” the more you die to dark spirits the quicker you lose your “life” or “will to live” and thus receive a game over

Expanding on that…

Vampires could be required to kill/hunt humans or a variation of humans, to satisfy their bloodlust. If they don’t, then they die.

Werewolves could pray on animals of some form, or generally any meat substance.

Witches… I’ve got nothing. They’re basically humans with supernatural powers…

Read full topic

item.title: Player aging ingame
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

for every dark spirit you defeat and release their souls to the desired god you follow, you are blessed with energy. the more energy the longer you remain “alive.” the more you die to dark spirits the quicker you lose your “life” or “will to live” and thus receive a game over

item.title: Player aging ingame
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mod eldest:

Dynamic neck beards with the ability to wear a fedora as a middle aged adult.

Now now, why would we want to play as you in game?
[hr]

On topic:
You need to go in depth on the ideas…
If the human race is the only one that can die over time, no one will play it. There needs to be a solution to that. Either by doing a quest to gain immortality, or having it from the getgo.

Read full topic

@bowserjr2 wrote:

Make a second of game time be equal to a second of real time and short life span wouldn’t be a problem.

runescape sucks:

Why would anyone play as a human if the other races are immortal? Especially if there’s a disadvantage for being human.

There would be a disadvantage for each race… I’m sure.
